title: Health and Welfare Act 2013 (No. 15 of 2013), for the purpose of giving full
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Pet Travel (Cats, dogs and ferrets)
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Pet Travel (Cats, dogs and ferrets) 

(Amendment) Regulations 2021.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited pet travel (cats dog ferrets) (amendment) regulation 2021

title: Health and Welfare Act 2013 (No. 15 of 2013), for the purpose of giving full
heading: 2. The Pet Travel (Cats, dogs and ferrets) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 141
text_raw:
2. The Pet Travel (Cats, dogs and ferrets) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 141 

of 2020) are amended- 

(a) 

(b) 

in Regulation 7 (2) by substituting “Finland, Malta or Norway” 
for “Finland, Malta or the United Kingdom”, and 

in Regulation 8(2) by inserting “Dublin Port,” after “Dublin 
Airport,”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

9 March, 2021. 

CHARLIE MCCONALOGUE, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

1 OJ L 178, 28.6.2013, p. 1 
2 OJ L 178, 28.6.2013, p. 109 
3 OJ L 329, 14.11.2014, p. 23 
4 OJ L 96, 12.4.2016, p. 26 
5 OJ L 204, 2.8.2019, p. 3 
6 OJ L 130, 28.5.2018, p. 1 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 6th April, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [151] 3

title: Health and Welfare Act 2013 (No. 15 of 2013), for the purpose of giving full
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

This Statutory Instrument amends the Pet Travel (Cats, dogs and ferrets) 
Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 141 of 2020) in view of the departure of the UK from 
the European Union. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [151]
